proveit-add-reference-button: Text for the button to create a new reference
proveit-add-reference-tooltip: Tooltip for the button to create a new reference
proveit-add-template-button: Text for the button to create a new citation template
proveit-add-template-tooltip: Tooltip for the button to create a new citation template
proveit-refresh-button: Text for the button to refresh the list of references and citation templates
proveit-refresh-tooltip: Tooltip for the button to refresh the list of references and citation templates
proveit-back-button:
Text for the button to return to the list of references and citation templates
{{Identical|Back}}
proveit-back-tooltip: Tooltip for the button to return to the list of references and citation templates
proveit-back-confirm: Confirmation message when the user wants to leave without saving the changes
proveit-previous-button: Text for the button that navigates to the previous reference or citation template
proveit-previous-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that navigates to the previous reference or citation template
proveit-next-button: Text for the button that navigates to the next reference or citation template
proveit-next-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that navigates to the next reference or citation template
proveit-reuse-button: Text for the button to reuse the reference being edited
proveit-reuse-tooltip: Tooltip for the button to reuse a reference
proveit-filter-fields: Placeholder for the input field to filter parameters
proveit-filter-list: Placeholder for the input field to filter the list of references and citation templates
proveit-insert-button:
Text for the button that inserts the reference or citation template being created
{{Identical|Insert}}
proveit-insert-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that inserts the reference or citation template being created
proveit-no-references: Text for when no references are found
proveit-normalize-button: Text for the button that normalizes the wikitext of all the references and citation templates
proveit-normalize-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that normalizes the wikitext of all the references and citation templates
proveit-normalize-confirm: Confirmation message when the user is about to normalize all references and citation templates
proveit-reference-name-label: Label for the field of the reference name
proveit-reference-name-warning: Warning message when a user deletes the name of a reference that has reuses or subreferences
proveit-reference-name-required: Warning message when a user tries to reuse a reference that doesn't have a name
proveit-reference-group-label: Label for the field of the reference group
proveit-reference-extends-label: Label for the field of the reference 'extends' attribute
proveit-reference-extends-tooltip: Tooltip for the field of the reference 'extends' attribute
proveit-reference-content-label: Label for the field of the reference content
proveit-generate-label: Label for the field where to enter the input from which to generate a citation template
proveit-generate-button: Text for the button that generates a citation template automatically using the Citoid service and other methods
proveit-generate-placeholder: Placeholder for the field where to enter the input from which to generate a citation template
proveit-generate-generating: Status text while the citation template is being generated
proveit-generate-fail: Generic error message when no citation template could be generated
proveit-template-label:
Label for the field of the citation template name.
{{Identical|Template}}
proveit-template-select: Text for the dropdown option when no template has been selected
proveit-remove-button:
Text for the button that removes the current reference or citation template from the page wikitext
{{Identical|Remove}}
proveit-remove-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that removes the current reference or citation template from the page wikitext
proveit-remove-confirm: Confirmation message when the users tries to remove a reference that has reuses or subreferences
proveit-show-all-button: Text for the button that shows all the parameter fields
proveit-show-all-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that shows all the parameter fields
proveit-archive-button: Text for the button that fetches the archived URL
proveit-archive-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that fetches the archived URL
proveit-archive-fetching: Status text while the archived URL is being fetched
proveit-archive-success: Message when the archived URL was fetched successfully
proveit-archive-not-found: Error message when no archived URL is found
proveit-archive-error: Error message when access to the Wayback Machine API fails
proveit-today-button:
Text for the button that inserts the current date
{{Identical|Today}}
proveit-today-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that inserts the current date
proveit-normalize-date-button: Text for the button that normalizes a date
proveit-normalize-date-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that normalizes a date
proveit-update-button:
Text for the button that updates the current reference or citation template in the page wikitext
{{Identical|Update}}
proveit-update-tooltip: Tooltip for the button that updates the current reference or citation template in the page wikitext
